channel.title: Compiler project
channel.description: i need help making a compiler that it will compile everything without restarting server. Like you can make an npc in autospawn.java and normally you need to compile and then restart server i know there is a way to make a compiler where it imports everything into the server without restarting it.

item.title: Compiler project
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

This isn’t possible. When the server is run everyhtign inside all the files is initialised/stored and you can’t change anything inside the stored files unless you turn it off and re-load it.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler project
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

That is such a rip off my quote…

Read full topic

item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

“Nothing is impossible - The possibility of it happening is as big as your determination to make it happen” - Tobias.

item.title: Compiler project
item.dc:creator: @Goodoo_dolls Goodoo dolls
item.description:
@Goodoo_dolls wrote:

im not lazy i just thought it would be a good idea and i never close my runserver.bat without compiling first and getting rid of my errors it also take me like 8 seconds to do it more like3

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler project
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

[quote=“icraft, post:6, topic:200865”]It’s not possible.
You have to close runserver.
Run compiler.
Exit compiler.
Run runserver.
Just because your lazy and want to make it 1 minute instead of 2, we don’t have to work our ass off.[/quote]

No, your PC is lame, thats why it takes you two minutes.
It only takes me 7 seconds flat.

Oh, and your retarded if you close runserver before compiling -.- What if you get an error? Scumbag.

Compile. (Then fix all the errors in your case)
Exit compile
Exit runserver
Run runserver

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler project
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“icraft, post:6, topic:200865”]It’s not possible.
You have to close runserver.
Run compiler.
Exit compiler.
Run runserver.
Just because your lazy and want to make it 1 minute instead of 2, we don’t have to work our ass off.[/quote]You don’t have to close runserver to compile…

That takes much more downtime than is needed. >.>

Compile, stop runserver, start runserver. Tada! 3 seconds max.

Read full topic
